summary:
•	8 years solid HR professional working experience, 6 years recruiting and HRBP experience in the pharmaceutical industry. 
•	Familiar with HR management in China and US, have in-depth understanding about the maximizing the talent capabilities under different culture backgrounds. Strong capability of recruiting leadership positions and critical scientific roles across China and US, have track record of building up full-function teams from scratch.
•	Be an active member in the talent communities of China and US, have solid skills in Talent Acquisition/ HRBP | People Management | Project Management.

currentPositions.description:
•	As a key member in the Talent Acquisition team, focusing on the recruiting of high level and critical positions in China and US.
•	Be the HR talent acquisition partner of company’s leadership team to forecast and identify the organizational needs and develop the recruiting plan. build the talent pipeline and train the key talents, manage all the HR recruiting processes.
•	Explore and optimize the hiring channels, manage local HR services vendors, keep improving the hiring efficiency.
•	As the project leader of CARsgen global talent pool, conduct the high-level position’s talent mapping and Profound understanding Both US and China’s talent market.
Achievement:
•	Recruitment volume: annual recruitment demand completion is 85%.
•	Recruitment quality: The passive demission rate of new employees within 6 months:0%.
•	Recruitment costs: direct sourcing rate for high-level positions is higher than 60%.
•	Recruitment channel management and optimization:
	Formulate internal services vendors using principle and the establish an evaluation mechanism for vendors. To improving the hiring efficiency and reduce the costs.
•	Lead US site manufacturing team’s build up: 
	Successfully build up the executive management team for our US site through direct sourcing.
currentPositions.title: Talent Acquisition Manager

headline: HR Manager

ingestedContentSummary.fullText: * Responsibilities * Collaborate with hiring managers to determine staffing needs and develop effective recruitment strategies. * Source potential candidates through various channels, including online job boards, social media, and networking. * Screen resumes and conduct initial phone/Video interviews to assess candidate qualifications and fit with company culture. * Coordinate and schedule onsite interviews with hiring managers. Ensure a positive candidate experience throughout the hiring process. * Manage the entire recruitment process, including job postings, interview coordination, offer negotiation and on-board preparation. * Maintain a strong pipeline of qualified candidates for current and future job openings. * Establish, update and maintain the core position talent pool, and establish the corresponding talent pool according to the actual situation of the position, and reserve professional talents in specific fields. * Stay up to date on industry trends and best practices in talent acquisition. * Collaborate with team members to sort out the recruitment process, optimize the recruitment process and improve the recruitment efficiency. * Complete other tasks assigned by line manager. * Qualifications * Bachelor’s degree or above, major in human resource management or business administration. * More than 3 years of relevant recruiting working experience, familiar with pharmaceutical industry. * Familiar with all kinds of recruitment channels, master interview skills. * Good communication and coordination skills, good teamwork awareness. * Proactive and responsible.
